scripts.dev:watch: concurrently "npm run build:watch --prefix ../thriptify-libs/packages/tokens" "npm run build:watch --prefix ../thriptify-libs/packages/ui-elements" "npm run build:watch --prefix ../thriptify-libs/packages/components"
scripts.dev:ios: concurrently "npm run build:watch --prefix ../thriptify-libs/packages/tokens" "npm run build:watch --prefix ../thriptify-libs/packages/ui-elements" "npm run build:watch --prefix ../thriptify-libs/packages/components" "npm run ios"
scripts.dev:android: concurrently "npm run build:watch --prefix ../thriptify-libs/packages/tokens" "npm run build:watch --prefix ../thriptify-libs/packages/ui-elements" "npm run build:watch --prefix ../thriptify-libs/packages/components" "npm run android"
scripts.dev:web: concurrently "npm run build:watch --prefix ../thriptify-libs/packages/tokens" "npm run build:watch --prefix ../thriptify-libs/packages/ui-elements" "npm run build:watch --prefix ../thriptify-libs/packages/components" "npm run web"
